010package imagingbook.common.threshold.global;
011
012import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
013import imagingbook.common.threshold.Thresholder;
014
015/**
016 * Common interface to be implemented by all global thresholders.
017 * 
018 * @author WB
019 * @version 2022/08/01
020 */
021public interface GlobalThresholder extends Thresholder {
022        
023        /**
024         * Returns a single (global) threshold value for the
025         * specified histogram.
026         * 
027         * @param h a histogram (array of frequencies)
028         * @return a single (global) threshold value
029         */
030        public int getThreshold(int[] h);
031        
032        /**
033         * Returns a single (global) threshold value for the
034         * specified {@link ByteProcessor} (8-bit image).
035         * 
036         * @param bp a {@link ByteProcessor} (8-bit image)
037         * @return a single (global) threshold value
038         */
039        public default int getThreshold(ByteProcessor bp) {
040                int[] h = bp.getHistogram();
041                return getThreshold(h);
042        }
043        
044        @Override
045        public default boolean threshold(ByteProcessor ip) {
046                int q = getThreshold(ip);
047                if (q > 0) {
048                        ip.threshold(q);
049                        return true;
050                }
051                else {
052                        return false;
053                }
054        }
055        
056}
